arts.ttl: Atlético keep up with Real Madrid as Griezmann’s special goal aids winning effort vs. Mallorca
arts.sum: On what was Diego Simeone's 500th La Liga game in charge of Atleti, his side put in a solid display, winning key duels around the pitch and continuing their impressive defensive record. Atlético Madrid recorded an important victory in their continued quest to challenge for the La Liga title, with a 2-0 home victory over RCD Mallorca.

arts.ttl: Player Ratings: Vintage display sees Atlético over the line against Mallorca
arts.sum: Took up a floating role just behind Alexander Sørloth and created three chances in the first half — including a shot assist for Giuliano that came out of nowhere on the left-hand side of the box. Assisted Lino’s goal with a quick forward run and a killer final ball.

arts.ttl: Atlético star to miss Real Madrid showdown through suspension
arts.sum: A headline member of the defensive ranks at La Liga giants Atlético Madrid is set to be unavailable for selection in next weekend’s derby. This comes owing to developments in…

arts.ttl: Official | St. Pauli confirm Siebe van der Heyden as fourth new January arrival
arts.sum: Hamburg's FC St. Pauli officially confirmed their fourth winter arrival yesterday.

arts.ttl: Damage limitation for Mallorca at Atletico Madrid
arts.sum: But football is a funny old game and, just maybe, Mallorca might score their first goal of 2025. Mallorca have played eight, soon to be ten, games on a Monday night .

arts.ttl: Champions League draw LIVE with Liverpool, Arsenal and Villa's paths and Man City's huge tie
arts.sum: While eight clubs have already booked their place in the Champions League's round of 16, another 16 - including some of the competition's biggest hitters - face a play-off round

Atletico Madrid have won their previous four meetings with Mallorca and sit second in La Liga. Mallorca are pushing for the Champions League places, but they've lost their last two La Liga fixtures....

arts.ttl: Report: Atletico Madrid close to securing versatile Arsenal ace
arts.sum: With only a few days to go of the current transfer window, there isn’t long for deals to be executed. Mikel Arteta allowing Oleksandr Zinchenko to move could be one that does go through before the deadline, however. arts.ttl: Atletico Madrid register interest in highly-rated La Liga midfielder
arts.sum: Atletico Madrid are keen to sign a new defensive midfielder, and a shortlist has started to be compiled by the club’s sporting department. At this stage, there are a couple of names closer to home that feature in their thoughts. Thomas Lemar’s expected departure at some stage in 2024, coupled with Koke Resurreccion not getting […] The post Atletico Madrid register interest in highly-rated La Liga midfielder appeared first on Football España.

arts.ttl: Alvaro Morata to leave AC Milan six months after arrival from Atletico Madrid
arts.sum: Last summer, Alvaro Morata left Atletico Madrid after guiding Spain to Euro 2024 success. He joined AC Milan, although he is now set to depart from the Serie A giants after only half a season. Morata has struggled to make a significant impact since arriving at the Rossoneri, having scored six times in 26 appearances.
